source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_000<tab>It is fortunate that no imperial forces bar your path into this fragment of Dalamud, but do not underestimate the dangers that lurk without. As for the dangers that lie within, I have little insight or advice to offer beyond the painfully obvious: prepare for the worst.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_000<tab>It is fortunate that no imperial forces bar your path into this fragment of Dalamud, but do not underestimate the dangers that lurk without. As for the dangers that lie within, I have little insight or advice to offer beyond the painfully obvious: prepare for the worst.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_011<tab>Ask about the Second Coil of Bahamut.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_011<tab>Ask about the Second Coil of Bahamut.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_100_011<tab>Ask about the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage).
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_100_011<tab>Ask about the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage).

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_100_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_100_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_Q3_000_015<tab>What would you like to ask about?
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_Q3_000_015<tab>What would you like to ask about?

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_A3_000_016<tab>Entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_A3_000_016<tab>Entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A3_100_016<tab>Entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage).
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A3_100_016<tab>Entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage).

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_A3_000_017<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_00105_A3_000_017<tab>Nothing.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_020<tab>As I understand it, the mechanism that controls the internment hulk will likely be located in the deepest section of the fragment. I can scarce imagine the layers of nightmarish defenses that stand between you and your goal...
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_020<tab>As I understand it, the mechanism that controls the internment hulk will likely be located in the deepest section of the fragment. I can scarce imagine the layers of nightmarish defenses that stand between you and your goal...

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Second Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Second Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Second Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Second Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Another Turn in the Coil.”
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Another Turn in the Coil.”

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members who have not progressed as far as the party leader may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members who have not progressed as far as the party leader may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>In this case, their progress will be updated to be the same as that of the leader.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>In this case, their progress will be updated to be the same as that of the leader.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Please note, however, that parties whose members have progressed further than the party leader cannot resume a foray.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Please note, however, that parties whose members have progressed further than the party leader cannot resume a foray.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Second Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Second Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>As the name suggests, the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is a brutally difficult version of the raid of the same name.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>As the name suggests, the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is a brutally difficult version of the raid of the same name.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>All members must have completed the quest “Sing Me Another Song.”
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>All members must have completed the quest “Sing Me Another Song.”

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is shared with the normal version of the raid.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is shared with the normal version of the raid.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Please note that there are no enhanced rewards available for the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage). Clearing the raid, however, will earn you an achievement.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Please note that there are no enhanced rewards available for the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage). Clearing the raid, however, will earn you an achievement.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_074<tab>Details such as time limit and required party composition are unchanged from the normal version of the raid. For more information, please refer to the entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_074<tab>Details such as time limit and required party composition are unchanged from the normal version of the raid. For more information, please refer to the entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>?
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>?

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A2_000_101<tab>Yes

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A2_000_102<tab>No
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A2_000_102<tab>No

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_200<tab>Have a care when exploring the southern reaches of Alder Springs. Though I understand the desire to examine that massive structure up close, the surrounding area is rife with lumbering golems.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_ANAELLE_000_200<tab>Have a care when exploring the southern reaches of Alder Springs. Though I understand the desire to examine that massive structure up close, the surrounding area is rife with lumbering golems.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed the Second Coil of Bahamut, and cannot enter again until progress is reset.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed the Second Coil of Bahamut, and cannot enter again until progress is reset.

target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.
target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.

source: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEFOREST_A3_000_301<tab>Cancel
